text: Pleuroploca granosa is a species of sea snail, a marine gastropod mollusk in the family Fasciolariidae, the spindle snails, the tulip snails and their allies. ==Description== ==Distribution== ==References== ==External links== * Category:Fasciolariidae Category:Gastropods described in 1832 Category:Taxa named by William Broderip
title: Pleuroploca granosa
